Keywords: Cosmic , Herald , Scientist
Real Name: Uatu
Special Powers
I AM HERE TO OBSERVE THE IMPORTANT COSMIC EVENTS THAT ARE ABOUT TO UNFOLD: When an opposing character rolls to attack or break away, after resolutions, if one or more friendly characters within range and line of fire used Probability Control to reroll it, gain 1 MISSION POINT. (Mission Points: The game ends when, after the resolution of any action, a player has achieved 20 or more MISSION POINTS (from any source). If the game ends this way, the winner is determined by the player with the most MISSION POINTS. In the case of a tie, the active player wins.)
Figure Errata
Changed I AM HERE TO OBSERVE THE IMPORTANT COSMIC EVENTS THAT ARE ABOUT TO UNFOLD

Comments
October 10, 2021
SpaceTitanium
Interesting to note the change on his mission points: They changed it so the status of the roll doesn't have to be affected, it no longer has to be from hit to miss, etc. But changing it to only key off friendly rerolling of opposing rolls is a huge enough blow that it still basically ruins him IMO. Takes away so much of the implicit threat he poses to your opponent as they can just reroll your rolls until the cows come home now.
